creator: Creative Scenius SRL
descriptionHtml:
Everyday, payday!

With our application the employees can request earned wages in advance based on the worked days.

Employees will be notified by their employer about the existence of this service. Employees will then download an app, provide a code that would uniquely identify themselves and their employer and open an account.

Account opening will involve accepting custom terms and conditions, as negotiated with the employer, identifying the employee and setting a password. Once identified the employee will see its current salary, days worked and amount of money available for withdrawal.

Depending on the negotiated terms, the Employee may have to pay a fee for each transfer or the Employer will have to pay either a fee per transfer or a flat fee for using the service.
descriptionShort: Allow employees to request earned wages based on the worked days

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Registration flow based on selfie and ID card photo.
Enjoy! Every day is payday!

title: Viva Advance

creator: Creative Scenius SRL
descriptionHtml:
With our application, the employees can request earned wages in advance based on the worked days.

How is working:

- The employer is signing an agreement with Viva Advance for using the application for its employees.
- The employer is informing its employees about the application
- The employees are creating an account in the mobile application with the email address and are registering to the employer sending their data (name, selfie, id card picture)
- The employer will identify the employer based on the data submitted by the employee in the registration process and will activate him in the system (adding payday, salary, and IBAN)
- The employee will receive an email with the confirmation that was accepted, and they can start to withdraw money using the mobile app.
- For each withdrawal, a transaction will be created and will be processed by Viva Advance.
- When the money is sent to the employee's bank account, a notification will be sent to them.

Advantages of using the app:

- If your car is broken down and you have to repair it, you don't need credit! Why not use the money you won? You don't have to wait for the payday at the end of the month.
- You can see in real-time the amount of money you won.
- You can withdraw anytime worked money and make your life easy.

Observations:

- The application is not a payroll application, but we integrate it with the payroll application of the employer
- Our application is not offering payday loans

Your employer can integrate with Viva Advance easily and at no cost. Let them know you'd like earned waged access by getting in touch below!

- https://vivaadvance.com/app/request

Ready to make any day payday?
descriptionShort: With Viva Advance, every day is a payday!
title: Viva Advance

creator: Creative Scenius SRL
descriptionHtml:
With our application, the employees can request earned wages in advance based on the worked days.

How is working:

- The employer is signing an agreement with Viva Advance for using the application for its employees and gets a code (employer code)
- The employer is informing its employees about the application and is giving them the employer code that will be used in the mobile app
- The employees are creating an account in the mobile application with the email address and are registering to the employer sending their data (name, selfie, id card picture)
- The employer will identify the employer based on the data submitted by the employee in the registration process and will activate him in the system (adding payday, salary, and IBAN)
- The employee will receive an email with the confirmation that was accepted, and they can start to withdraw money using the mobile app.
- For each withdrawal, a transaction will be created and will be processed by Viva Advance.
- When the money is sent to the employee's bank account, a notification will be sent to them.

Advantages of using the app:

- If your car is broken down and you have to repair it, you don't need credit! Why not use the money you won? You don't have to wait for the payday at the end of the month.
- You can see in real-time the amount of money you won.
- You can withdraw anytime worked money and make your life easy.

Observations:

- The application is not a payroll application, but we integrate it with the payroll application of the employer
- Our application is not offering payday loans

Your employer can integrate with Viva Advance easily and at no cost. Let them know you'd like earned waged access by getting in touch below!

- https://vivaadvance.com/app/request

- The employer will identify the employer based on the data submitted by the employee in the registration process and will activate him in the system (adding payday, salary, and IBAN)
- The employee will receive an email with the confirmation that was accepted, and they can start to withdraw money using the mobile app.
- For each withdrawal, a transaction will be created and will be processed by Viva Advance.
- When the money is sent to the employee's bank account, a notification will be sent to them.

Advantages of using the app:

- If your car is broken down and you have to repair it, you don't need credit! Why not use the money you won? You don't have to wait for the payday at the end of the month.
- You can see in real-time the amount of money you won.
- You can withdraw anytime worked money and make your life easy.

Observations:

- The application is not a payroll application, but we integrate it with the payroll application of the employer
- Our application is not offering payday loans

Your employer can integrate with Viva Advance easily and at no cost. Let them know you'd like earned waged access by getting in touch below!

- https://vivaadvance.com/app/request
